product_name: The North Face Farrows Apex Shell Pants - Women's
long_description: The denim-inspired Farrows Apex shell pants by The North Face offer a slim fit with water resistance and unrestricted movement to keep you comfortable and mobile on the hill. Apex ClimateBlock fabric delivers near-waterproof and windproof protection with excellent breathability for comfort during aerobic activity in demanding conditions. Internal adjustable waist tabs deliver a custom fit. Zip hand pockets; back pockets. Hems have gripper elastic and boot hooks to help keep hems in place. Belt loops offer easy integration with powder skirts on compatible jackets from The North Face (jacket sold separately). The women's Farrows Apex shell pants have a slim fit.
short_description: The denim-inspired Farrows Apex shell pants by The North Face offer a slim fit with water resistance and unrestricted movement to keep you comfortable and mobile on the hill.
